attributes.description: ONE OWNER IN MY OPINION, THE CHINESE MANUFACTURERS ARE NOW WHERE THE KOREANS WERE 15 YEARS AGO WITH THE 2010 IX35 AND SPORTAGE. The Koreans are still making great cars but the price is no longer so affordable. Take this H2 LUXURY, for example, if it were an HYUNDAI OR KIA OF SIMILAR SIZE AND SPEC THEN IT WOULD BE SELLING FOR CLOSE TO R500 000 one owner since new, AS NEW CONDITION, 1ST 2 Services completed on schedule and up to date with HAVAL, BALANCE OF SERVICE PLAN AND 5 YEAR120 000 KM FACTORY WARRANTY WHICH EQUALS 100 PEACE OF MIND MOTORING, Dark Ruby Metallic, Black Leather Upholster is like new and finished with Satin Silver Trim. This is the facelift model and has a few more features like different mags, led lights down the sides of the vehicle to name a few also a Glass Sunroof. The most special combination The luxury spec of the H2 is an entirely different animal from the entrylevel CITY spec. Auto Armor Smash and Grab Safety Film are also included. This one is as clean as a whistle Perfectly Looked After By Responsible Previous Owner, 4 NEW TYRES. IT LOOKS DRIVES AND EVEN SMELLS LIKE A BRAND NEW VEHICLE The new generation 1.5 turbocharged engine offers brilliant power, and is extremely light on fuel, Impossible to find a better value, spacious modern DEMO S.U.V available in this price range must be seen and driven to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AATESTED INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
